com.logisima.javagit.cli.reset
Class GitResetOptions

java.lang.Object
  com.logisima.javagit.cli.reset.GitResetOptions

public class GitResetOptions
extends Object

A class to manage passing arguments to the GitReset command. GitReset resets the HEAD of the current checked out branch to the state of a previous commit.

Default values:

  • resetType - ResetType.MIXED
  • commitName - CommitName.HEAD
  • quiet - false

Nested Class Summary
static class GitResetOptions.ResetType
          An enumeration of the types of resets that can be performed.

public boolean isQuiet()
Is the reset to perform quietly?

Returns:
